metadata.description:
From quite literally out of nowhere comes this lush, beautiful 'triphop' (although that's probably an over-used phrase) track from the excellent Vinyl Matt. A choice sample (that soundtrack fans may or may not recognise), all underpinned by some gorgeously halfspeed drums and drifty crunchiness, means perfect music for relaxing in the land where time stands still.

Hopefully we'll be hearing more from the mysterious Vinyl Matt soon, but in the meantime, enjoy the first fruits of his labour.
metadata.title: Vinyl Matt - From The Education [mtw012]
metadata.subject: Electronic
